COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0
STRING: Wandering in the general direction of the Old Wing, I
was stopped by Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, do you have a moment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Yeah, what's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: [Torta] “There was something I wanted to ask you
about, but... Are you okay for time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: Even if I went straight to the Old Wing, Lise wouldn't be
there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170
STRING: So it didn't matter where I passed the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: I sat myself down, and waited for Torta to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190
STRING: [Torta] “Have you been making sure to practice,
recently...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6
STRING: [Chris] “Hm... Yeah, somewhat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc
STRING: I had been practicing, although it wasn't practice for the
graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: I didn't really see you at the practice
rooms last week, so I was wondering.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232
STRING: [Chris] “I know... But, I've still been practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: [Torta] “That's good to hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e
STRING: But, who have you been
practicing with?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: [Chris] “A girl in the first year... From the vocal course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0
STRING: It wouldn't have been a good idea to hide it from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac
STRING: It was a big if, but if Lise and I ended up performing the
graduation recital together, Torta would be hurt if I
didn't tell her beforehand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8
STRING: [Torta] “How did you make friends with someone like
that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe
STRING: [Chris] “It was just by coincidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330
STRING: [Torta] “But, a first year, huh. What's she like?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: [Chris] “She's... Quiet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Torta] “Is she a good singer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: [Chris] “I think so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac
STRING: [Torta] “You don't sound so sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: Oh well... Introduce
me to her someday!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, why not... If the opportunity arises.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: Responding in this way, I actually thought that perhaps
this would be good for Lise, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: Torta was a third year voice student, and it might help
Lise with her confidence if she was to receive
acknowledgment from such a third year student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, actually, what about today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? T-Today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: [Chris] “We haven't made an agreement to meet, so
there's no guarantee we'll see her...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6
STRING: [Torta] “That's fine with me, but... What about her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: [Chris] “That's a good question... She can be pretty shy,
but perhaps it'll be a little easier for her to talk to you,
since you're her senior in the vocal course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: [Torta] “I was expecting you to be a bit more against
the whole idea...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Chris] “Why would I be against it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Torta] “I kind of imagined that you were meeting this
pretty first year and keeping it a secret from me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: [Chris] “That's some imagination you've got there.
Anyway, she's still in class at the moment, so either way
we're going to have to kill time for a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x598
STRING: [Torta] “Oh. In that case, shall we just hang out here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ae
STRING: [Chris] “Sure. I'm going to get myself something to drink.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e0
STRING: [Torta] “Ah,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: I'll have a cioccolata, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61a
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: The time passed by quickly while Torta and I chatted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67c
STRING: The bell rung out through the school, and it was now
the time that regular classes for first and second years
would finish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: [Chris] “So, shall we go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ec
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x702
STRING: Torta drank down her cioccolata, which she had been
carefully sipping away at slowly, in one big gulp.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x718
STRING: [Chris] “That... Was already becoming solid, wasn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x736
STRING: [Torta] “Yep. It still tastes great when it's cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74c
STRING: Answering cheerfully with a response that wasn't the
one I had been hoping for, Torta then stood up briskly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76a
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: Heading into the main campus, I was able to spot Lise
from behind, as she must have been heading to the Old
Wing too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b4
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... That might be her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: Ahh, but... Where is she going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: [Chris] “The Old Wing. Let's catch up to her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83e
STRING: [Torta] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88c
STRING: Calling to her, I tapped on her shoulder from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: [Lise] “Ngh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: Waiting for Lise to turn around and say something, I
noticed that she was about to run off without even
looking back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e8
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fe
STRING: Before I knew it, I had grabbed her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x926
STRING: [Lise] “L-Let me go...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93c
STRING: [Chris] “S-Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: Upon hastily letting go of her hand, Lise finally looked at
me, and made a surprised face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x984
STRING: [Lise] “Ch-Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, sorry about that... I didn't mean to grab
your hand like that, it's just you started to run off and...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d6
STRING: [Lise] “I-It's okay, I... Didn't realize it was you. I'm sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: We were both apologizing to each other, but there was
something that I couldn't help but wonder about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: Would she have just run away if it hadn't been me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: And why?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: I wondered if she had friends who would make playful
jokes like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: But seeing how frantically she was apologizing, I was
unable to ask anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: [Chris] “You can stop apologizing. More importantly, I
brought a friend with me today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: I introduced Torta, who was standing behind me,
unable to keep up with what just happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, nice to meet you. I'm Chris's friend,
Tortinita. I'm in the third year of the vocal course...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab8
STRING: Before Torta could even finish introducing herself, Lise
had begun to tense up, and moved back as if to hide
behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: [Torta] “U-Umm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: Apologizing to both of them, I then spoke in a tiny voice
that only Torta would be able to hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb56
STRING: “I told you she was shy, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: Torta, now realizing what I had meant, nodded
somewhat confusedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Torta] “S-Sorry to suddenly show up like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbae
STRING: I just
happened to be passing by. Anyway, I'd better be
going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe0
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... I'm s-sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: Holding onto the sleeve of my uniform, Lise meekly
apologized and then went quiet again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: Was Lise like this the first time I had met her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc18
STRING: I had a feeling that it was even worse when we first
met, but recently we've been spending a lot of time
together so perhaps it was just my imagination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4a
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I am your senior after all, so feel free to
talk to me if you ever need help.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: Torta kindly told this to Lise, and then quietly mouthed
some words that only I could hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc80
STRING: “Very similar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcaa
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, have fun practicing. It's probably hard
being Chris's partner, but the one thing you can depend
on is his ability to play the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd4
STRING: [Chris] “The one thing? Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: I barely responded, and that was all I had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd04
STRING: Watching Torta head off as if nothing had ever
happened, I couldn't help but think about the meaning
of what she said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: It was true, Lise was probably very similar to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: Similar to Arie when she was in her worst state.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4e
STRING: [Lise] “U-Umm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd64
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Ohh, sorry. I just thought it might be good
for you two to meet, since Torta is your senior in the
vocal course and all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: [Lise] “I'm so sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: [Chris] “About what? I don't think Torta minded.
Anyway, let's get going to the music room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: [Lise] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: Even after arriving at the music room, the expression on
Lise's face still hadn't changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe34
STRING: [Chris] “Seriously, you don't need to worry about it. It
was my fault for suddenly bringing her, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: [Lise] “Th-That's not it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8e
STRING: [Chris] “C'mon, let's just do an ensemble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea4
STRING: I had the feeling that things weren't going to improve if
we kept talking like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeba
STRING: I got my Fortelle set up quickly, and played a first chord.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: I wasn't expecting her to suddenly start singing with a
smile on her face, but Lise continued to just look at me
with the same expression on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf00
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: [Lise] “What did Torta mean by ‘partner?’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: [Chris] “Ahh. You're a first year, so no wonder you don't
know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: [Chris] “So, in March there's a graduation examination
coming up, and since I'm in the Fortelle course, I have
to do an ensemble for that examination. One with
vocals, that is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfba
STRING: [Chris] “And besides, Torta was just getting the wrong
impression, so don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: [Chris] “However, it's just about the time that I have to
make a decision about who I partner up with, and since
I said I've been practicing, well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: fda
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose it's natural that she got
the wrong idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1060
STRING: [Lise] “Then... Why are you practicing with the likes of
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: What Lise said was unusually frank for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: Truth be told, Lise may have been right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: But, the way she said “the likes of me” bothered me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: [Chris] “Even so... I had kind of been thinking that it
would be nice if I could end up having you as my
partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: This was probably a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: But, it became the truth the moment I put it into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: [Chris] “I hadn't spoken of it because we'd only done
ensembles once together... But I was thinking of asking
you about it eventually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: [Chris] “Of course... I wasn't going to try and coerce you
or anything... Just, if you were interested... You know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: For Lise, who was incredibly shy, this was probably all
too sudden.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115e
STRING: For me also, it was something I had only thought of
right this moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116a
STRING: I brought up something else as cheerfully as I could, in
an attempt to avoid talking about this anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: [Chris] “But more so than that, I'm just really enjoying
our ensembles at the moment. Why don't we put the
partner thing aside for now, and do an ensemble?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: [Chris] “You're not enjoying the ensembles, Lise...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: [Lise] “Th-That's not...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: That's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: [Chris] “Not today...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Lise] “No... We can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. I'm all ready to go... How about you,
Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ba
STRING: [Lise] “M-Me too. I sang in class earlier, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: [Chris] “Great. In that case, let's get started.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134a
STRING: In the beginning, Lise still seemed a bit bothered by
what had just happened, but after rehearsing for an
hour or so, she appeared to be feeling a lot better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: Now she was singing happily again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1376
STRING: I could really tell that Lise loved singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: I also really felt that she needed an opportunity to show
that to an audience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: It didn't have to be my graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a4
STRING: Anywhere would have been fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b0
STRING: But, there had to be people to hear her sing, and
people to acknowledge her ability.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c6
STRING: If it were this ensemble that people were to hear, I was
sure that the majority of them would be impressed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1408
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, we're done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1442
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: She sang with all her heart, and once we had finished,
she seemed almost embarrassed when she nodded in
response to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: [Lise] “Um... About today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: [Chris] “It was fun, huh? Can we rehearse again
sometime?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: [Lise] “Uh, yes. Of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1500
STRING: But, that's not what I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150c
STRING: [Chris] “You can tell me tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153e
STRING: [Lise] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1554
STRING: [Chris] “Would you mind if we rehearsed tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: [Lise] “N-No, I... Uh... Don't mind at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, could you come by the cafeteria
once your classes have finished?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ba
STRING: [Lise] “I'd rather not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d0
STRING: [Chris] “We're not going to eat there or anything, you
only have to drop by. Okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f8
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. So, shall we call it a day?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: [Lise] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1656
STRING: Saying this, Lise, who still looked hesitant, started to get
ready to go home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: It wasn't out of the question that she could have an
extreme case of social anxiety... But even then, I still felt
that Lise needed to sing in public.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167a
STRING: Even if she failed the first time, she could just try again
until she got it right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1686
STRING: She was still a first year, which meant she still had over
two more years to work on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169e
STRING: But, nothing would ever change if she just continued to
sing by herself here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b4
STRING: I wasn't confident enough to think that I could make her
conquer her fears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: But if there was one thing I could do for her, it was
showing her that singing in public could help.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: It didn't have to be tomorrow or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e4
STRING: It could be after she became a second year, or after she
made friends with a different Fortelle player.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fa
STRING: I just wanted her to understand that singing in public
was one way she could change things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I'm going to head home now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: [Lise] “Ah, I'm going home too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1798
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, shall we go part of the way together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ca
STRING: [Lise] “Ah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e0
STRING: There didn't seem to be that awkward atmosphere that
was present last time, at least for now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f6
STRING: Relieved that we could walk together like this, the two
of us left the campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1848
STRING: We exchanged few words as we walked along one of
the main streets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: Lise wasn't the only one feeling the weight on their
mind about tomorrow- I felt it too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: I chose topics of conversation that wouldn't touch upon
that kind of thing, and continued chatting as we walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I have to turn here...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: As I spoke, I stopped at the corner of the intersection
which led to the Old District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c8
STRING: [Lise] “I have to go straight ahead...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18de
STRING: [Chris] “I see. Well, good rehearsal today!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1910
STRING: [Lise] “Yes, it was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1926
STRING: [Chris] “Don't forget about tomorrow, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: [Lise] “Sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: Lise responded in a somewhat firm voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197c
STRING: I watched her walk off towards the New District, and
then headed home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a2
STRING: I really wanted tomorrow's ensemble to be a success.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ae
STRING: Contrary to the weight I had been feeling earlier, I also
had such a hope in my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a10
STRING: [Phorni] “You're in an awfully good mood... Did
something happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a26
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing out of the ordinary, no...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3c
STRING: I enjoyed the ensemble with Lise today, but was that
showing on my face?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a52
STRING: Regarding my partner situation, I doubted that Lise in
her current state would ever say yes, and I also knew
that I had more important things to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa4
STRING: Phorni was looking at me quizzically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab0
STRING: As for Phorni, she wouldn't have been particularly happy
with this turn of events, as she was pushing for me to
partner up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac6
STRING: Of course, I knew that she would put my opinion on the
matter first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1adc
STRING: [Chris] “I did an ensemble with Lise again today... But
don't worry, I haven't forgotten about my graduation
performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b18
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, since you haven't forgotten about it,
what exactly do you plan to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b38
STRING: [Chris] “I'll... Think of something when the time comes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: I didn't want to lie about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5a
STRING: But, right now I was more preoccupied with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b66
STRING: I was sure that tomorrow's ensemble would be good for
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7c
STRING: Just thinking about this, I started to feel that I wouldn't
even regret it if I didn't ask her to be my partner for the
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bae
STRING: [Phorni] “＊Huff＊ Oh well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bda
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf0
STRING: Phorni still looked like she wanted to say something as
she made herself disappear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c06
STRING: I didn't feel like I was capable of giving her an
explanation that would be any more satisfactory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1c
STRING: Because quite frankly... I wasn't able to resist the
drowsiness that came from the happiness I felt today.
